daily_sales_report.description: Generates a summary of sales for a specific day, including top-selling fish items and sales by category.
user_prompt: Please generate a daily sales report
I want to generate a daily sales report
Can you create a daily sales report for me?
I need to see how much fish sold today
Give me a quick daily sales summary

weekly_sales_summary.description: Provides weekly sales performance including total revenue, best-selling products, and category performance.
user_prompt: Show me the weekly sales summary
Can you give me this week's sales report?
Show sales performance for this week
Get me the weekly revenue summary
How were the sales this week?
I need to check weekly sales performance
Can you summarize the sales for this week?
Show me the sales trend for this week
How did our sales go this week?

monthly_performance_report.description: Summarizes overall business performance for the month including profit margin, new customers, and operational highlights.
user_prompt: Please generate a monthly performance report
I want to generate a monthly performance report
Can you create a monthly performance report for me?
Show me this month's performance summary
How did we perform this month?
Get me the monthly business performance details
I need to check the performance report for this month
Show monthly revenue and performance overview
Summarize this month's key performance metrics
Give me a report of this month’s performance
Can you show the profit and performance for this month?

inventory_status_report.description: Tracks available fish stock, low-stock alerts, and reorder requirements.
user_prompt: I need to see low-stock alerts
List all products and stock quantities
How many items do we have in stock?
Give me a summary of inventory
Show me which products need restocking

customer_feedback_report.description: Analyzes customer feedback, ratings, and satisfaction trends for a selected time period.
user_prompt: I want to see customer feedback
Get me the feedback report for the selected period
Provide a report on customer feedback
Can you generate a customer review summary?
Give me feedback details from customers
Check how customers rated our products
Show me what customers are saying

revenue_and_profit_report.description: Summarizes total revenue, cost of goods sold, and overall profit margins for a specified period.
user_prompt: Show me profit and revenue summary
I want to see the revenue report
Get me the profit and loss summary
Provide a revenue and profit analysis
Can you generate the revenue report for me?
Give me a summary of profits and revenue
Show total revenue and profit for the month
Summarize earnings and costs for the selected period
Give me a monthly revenue overview

customer_purchase_behavior_report.description: Analyzes purchasing trends of customers including frequency, order size, and preferred fish types.
user_prompt: I want to see customer purchase behavior
Get me the report on customer buying habits
Show how often customers are ordering
Provide a summary of customer order patterns
Can you generate a customer buying report?
Give me insights on customer purchase frequency
Check what products customers are buying most
Show customer preferences and purchase trends

refund_and_returns_report.description: Tracks all refund and return transactions for quality issues, late delivery, or wrong items.
user_prompt: I want to see refund details
Get me the report on returned orders
Provide a summary of returns and refunds
Can you generate a refund and returns report?
Give me insights on customer returns
Report on returned products and refunds
Show me the refunds for this period

customer_segmentation_report.description: Groups customers based on purchase frequency, order value, and preferred fish categories to support targeted marketing.
user_prompt: I want to see how customers are segmented
Get me the report on customer groups
Provide a summary of customer segments

Give me insights on customer types
